job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Remote) - AI/NLP/Django
job.description:
If you are a Machine Learning Engineer with experience, please read on!

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • Recognized industry leader!
  • Competitive base salary and benefits!
  • Opportunity for professional growth!
What You Will Be Doing
  • Machine Learning research/implementation for AI and Natural Language Processing applications
  • Evaluate/integrate/deploy models
  • Develop NLP systems/ML pipelines
  • Work closely with our Data Scientists and Engineers to build/deploy models
What You Need for this Position
  • Coding/programming experience with 1 or more language
  • Experience & knowledge of data models, structure, and architecture
  • Machine Learning statistics, NLP, techniques
  • Machine Learning framework and library experience (preferably with TensorFlow and/or Scikit
  • SQL
  • Django
Nice To Have
  • NLP framework experience
  • NLP techniques
  • Big Data knowledge (Hadoop, Spark, Map Reduce)
What's In It for You

Benefits

For your hard work and dedication, you will be rewarded with a competitive base salary, and benefits including but not limited to
  • Competitive Base Salary (Up to $115k base DOE)
  • 401K
  • Vacation/PTO
  • Paid Holidays
  • Medical/Dental/Vision
So, if you are a Machine Learning Engineer with experience, please apply today!

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Kyle.Choban@Optello.com
  • Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : KC9-1637938 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Kyle Choban - Executive Recruiter - Optello

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
